name: Left Handed Giant Run Club
description: A weekly social running club meeting at the Left Handed Giant taproom.

events.details: There are two running groups split into 6km and 8km routes; both stop roughly halfway through the run to pause and regroup. As a social running group everyone is encouraged to run at their own pace and people typically stay behind after the run to enjoy a drink together. There are no changing facilities at the taproom, but there are toilets and a place to drop bags.

time.details: The run starts at 6:30PM, waiver signing / bag drop starts from 6:00PM onwards.

location.address: Left Handed Giant Brewpub, Finzels Reach, BS1 6EU

cost.details: Free to attend, attendees who join the run get 10% off drinks at the bar.

booking.details: No booking is required; please bring a smartphone so you can sign an electronic waiver on the night stating you'll be careful and considerate while running through the city.
